ComicInfo.Title: Dreamgirlz
ComicInfo.Summary:
WHAT ARE LITTLE BOYS MADE OF? - Part 3 of 5. In the name of all womankind, Princess Nightmare, Empress of Ten Thousand Screaming Worlds of Terror, arrives in Dakota to make life hell for all men - misogynists and Static alike.
Rick tells everyone in the school he is gay. This makes Virgil and his friends unsure of the relationship to Rick. Static faces of against Princess Nightmare, who is fighting oppression of women through music. Virgil and Rick have a fight over his coming out. Rick gets harassed at school for being gay. Static tracks Princess Nightmare and figures out how to catch her. Virgil beats his dad at a video game and then finds out that Frieda is angry at him for treating Rick badly.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:47:40. [CVDB40098]
ComicInfo.Characters: Frieda Goren, Larry Wade, Rick Stone, Sharon Hawkins, Static
